content.rendered:
Unified Infotech (“us”, “we”, or “our”) operates the https://www.unifiedinfotech.net website (the “Service”).

This page guides you to our policies regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of personal information when you avail our Service and the choices you have associated with that data.

Unified Infotech respects the privacy of the visitors and users to its website, the home page of which is located at https://www.unifiedinfotech.net (“Site”). This Privacy Policy is intended to update you of our policies and practices regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information and Anonymous Information you submit to us through our website.

By submitting Personal Information through the Site, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy and you expressly consent to the processing of your Personal Information according to this Privacy Policy. We do not use, collect, or disclose your personal information for any reason other than areas specified below, except with your consent or as required by law.

The software development services help to get the customer information which is provided by them in the registration form so that cookies can be placed on the customer’s computer. Then you can avail more information about customer activity which in turn helps to provide the desired information about the product preferred by them in right time. This helps the customer to save time and facilitate their buying process with ease.

The Information We Collect

Site Activity Data

Each time a guest results in these present circumstances site; our web server gathers and logs certain data. These entrance logs are kept for a reasonable period of time. These logs incorporate however are not confined to your machine’s TCP/IP address, your username (if pertinent), date, time and documents got to.

Cookies

Parts of the site may utilize cookies just for security and authentication purposes. This data is utilized exclusively to keep up your computer’s session to the server. This data isn’t shared or sold to outsider associations for any reason.

Personal Information

Individual data, for example, your name, individual postal and email address, or individual phone number is collected just when you voluntarily share it with us. Such data is received when you send an email through the website or reach, for example, finishing an online form or enrolling for a course.

The personal information you give to the association is sent just to the individual or division prepared to deal with your demand and is utilized just to react to your request.

As a web and mobile app development company, we (Unified Infotech) will not be selling any of the Personal information to any third parties.
